102-41 Collective bargaining agreementsEmployees in the U.S., Canada, India, and APAC 
regions are not unionized. Employees in the 
EMEA region have the freedom of association 
and the right to form and join a trade union; Xilinx 
does not, however, participate in any collective 
bargaining in the EMEA region but complies with 
all statutory obligations with regard to collective 
agreements. Our France office has an elected 
employee representative, and new this year our 
Taiwan office has formed a Labor Management 
Committee as required by law.
